title: XML Schema Support - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: This chapter describes the XML addition to the Ultra Format Definition Language (UFDL). This addition enables you to compile a subset of XML Schema element definitions and to decode the XML input data. This section has the following subsections: Overview External - XML Records IPDR Compliance XML Schema Limitations An XML Format Example
